titleStmt.title: Royal wanderer: or, Gods providence manifested, in the most mysterious deliverance of the divine majesty of Charls the Second, king of Great Britain ... To the tune of: The wandering prince of Troy, or, Troy town.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Right half-sheet contains: The second part to the same tune.
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
